issues.message: Tube keepers bolted to side frames
Restraint relief analysis required regardless of ΔT
Full penetration welds required for flanges
Shoulder type plugs with straight-threaded shank
Required hydro test pressure = 195 psi (1.3 × 150 psi)

issues.suggestion: Increase wall thickness or use higher strength material

issues.message: Material specification 'SA-516-70' not in standard database
issues.suggestion: Verify specification is correct and add to material database

issues.message: Surface prep 'SSPC-SP10' is not a valid SSPC standard
issues.suggestion: Use valid SSPC standard: SP-1, SP-2, SP-3, SP-6, SP-7, SP-10...

issues.message: Verify sling angles ≥45° from horizontal for safe rigging
No applicable codes specified for documentation requirements
issues.suggestion: Specify applicable codes (ASME VIII, AWS D1.1, API 661, etc.)

issues.message: No critical dimensions identified for inspection
issues.suggestion: Identify key dimensions for dimensional inspection
Collect MTR for all pressure-retaining and structural materials
Add general tolerances note per standard practice
